meanings.sent1: The dragon in the story was mythier than the one in the book.
meanings.sent2: The unicorn looked even mythier under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The mythier the tale, the more exciting the adventure!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with a mythier glow as she shared the ancient legend.
meanings.sent5: The castle in the clouds was the mythier than any other in the land.

meanings.sent1: The enchanted forest felt even mythier after the rain.
meanings.sent2: Legends of the sea creatures grew mythier with each passing year.
meanings.sent3: The mythier the story, the more children believed in magic.
meanings.sent4: The stars whispered secrets of a mythier world beyond our own.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins held a mythier aura as the sun set behind them.
